item.title:
The thing that bugs me most about the social media platform chaos, is there are so many new platforms and I have no idea which one will become dominant. And I guess because many others are also waiting to see, nothing really moves.
Anyway, I'm there with the same handle.

item.title:
There are as many Even numbers as there are Whole numbers (both even and odd). ü§î
For every Whole number 'n' in W, we can pair it with an Even number '2n' in E. And for every Even number '2n' in E, it has a corresponding Whole number 'n' in W.
